tool.help:
================================== MTBLS520 Eco-Metabolomics workflow ==================================
This is the computational workflow to study the seasonal variation of secondary metabolites in nine different bryophytes.
Module | Quality Control |
Description | Quality Control |
----- Input -----
Polarity | The polarity used for the mode of acquisition |
QC mzML | Dataset collection of the QC mzML files |
Analytical metadata | ISA-Tab format Assay metadata file |
Sample metadata | ISA-Tab format Sample metadata file |
------ Output ------
QC MAF | Metabolights Assignment file |
QC RT Correction | PDF plot |
QC MZ Deviation vs. RT | PDF plot |
QC MZ Deviation for samples | PDF plot |
QC RT Deviation for samples | PDF plot |
QC Chromatograms | PDF plot |
QC Profiles | PDF plot |
QC Profiles stacked | PDF plot |
QC Histogram | PDF plot |
QC Compound Variation | PDF plot |
QC Compounds | PDF plot |
QC PCA | PDF plot |
QC Rdata | Rdata file |
